context.title: Sample View
context.description: This is the context help for the sample view with a tree viewer. It was generated by a PDE template.
You can choose between different import sources. If you click on one of the items you will have several options to enter, depending on the import source you chosed.
An example LDAP-url looks like: "ldap://yourldapserver.com". Optionally you can specify the port with adding ":389" at the end. A common base looks like "dc=informatik,dc=tu-muenchen,dc=de".
